name: Aaron Williams-Mele
text: I love Blaze, the pizza is great and I really like building my own. I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on lately though, seems like morale is down. Today it seemed like everyone was on edge about something. Talk to your employees and figure out what‚Äôs going on or it‚Äôs going to really start affecting your business.

name: Calleigh Mahan
text: I ordered a gluten free cheese pizza for my daughter and this is what we got. There is hardly any cheese on it, mostly sauce, and what cheese is on it is burnt. I‚Äôm not exactly sure how someone can look at this and confidently put it in a box to serve to a customer.

name: Jessica Evans
text: Blaze is my favorite build your-own-pizza place! I could eat here everyday! They have plenty of sauces, cheeses, and toppings to choose from and they even have additional toppings and sauces for your pizza after it comes out of the oven! I love arugula and pesto drizzle on top of mine.

name: Terry Johnson
text: This was my first time trying it and my very last time. Could not get through the poor customer service. I ordered by phone through the Call Center and they stated that it would take 18 minutes for pickup. This was 10:10 PM. I arrived ‚Ä¶More

name: John Panko
text: Very good, quick pizza place.  The "DOUGH KNOTS"  were delicious!

name: Anthony Couillard
text: Good staff and quick, especially for lunch.  Pizza is good, little doughy for my taste, but think that may be just how the fire cooks it.  I asked them to cook a little longer to make crispy, which I'm sure they did, but was still not ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashlee R
text: Love this location. Great pizza, friendly staff, and clean location. What more could you ask for? Loyalty program is also fantastic.

name: David Stewart
text: great pizza at great price and it's so fast just walk in and in 8 minutes or less you got your pizzas

name: Wilson Dowdy
text: I went by Blaze Pizza today for Pi Day.  Any pizza for $3.14.  It was my very first time at a Blaze Pizza.  I downloaded the application and signed up for the rewards program too. I got a free fountain drink.  The concept of Blaze Pizza is ‚Ä¶More

name: Yvonne Marbury
text: Im so happy that Blaze Pizza is Vegan friendly. I love pizza and since I'm a new vegan so its painful to me to not have pizza with cheese on it, so imagine my surprise to see that not only do they have vegan cheese, but now they also have a ‚Ä¶More

name: Yashica Arora
text: Thought of having pizza in this pandemic time, went to blaze pizza. We ordered our pizza and waiting for it to be done. we look around to check if it is ready and pizza was on table and someone is sweeping floor next to it. When we went ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim Miller
text: My daughter suggested Blaze Pizza for her annual birthday dinner because they had a keto crust pizza. It was our first time visiting and we were both extremely impressed. The price was phenomenal and the food was exceptional. I will definitely be returning when I want a quality pizza at a great price!

name: John Boyce
text: My son and I have made many Covid Spring and Summer bike trips to visit Blaze Pizza and it has truly became our favourite. Be it the Take Two with Greek or Ceaser slalad options, the Amazing Garlic knots we dip in Marinara or the vegan ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelvin Fleming
text: I went to Blaze for the first time since the Covid-19 out brake. I though that the workers should be wearing a mask. I love the pizza and will return. Just my observation. They were wearing gloves. Note: best  pizza in town so I want them to succeed

name: Robert. Mantia
text: Fast and very fresh and one of the best pies I have had in a long time

name: Kristina Balducci
text: Absolutely the worst customer service I‚Äôve ever experienced. I walked in around 8:45pm (they don‚Äôt close until 10pm) and before I was even fully through the door, I was greeted by being snapped at with the question ‚Äúare you picking up?‚Äù. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Melissa Weaver
text: PI day was handled by this team effortlessly. Prompt service,  tasty product in a well managed clean restaurant.

name: Audrey Walker
text: From entry to exiting the people were nice and very enthusiastic about what they were doing. My only issue is they added arugula when I asked for them to hold it.

name: T D
text: Absolutely amazing. Delicious, and fair-priced. I wish the seating was larger, but so far I have been able to secure a seat. However, as good as this place is, there should be lines out the door soon. Hip atmosphere, music and food in a booming location is always a winning combination.

name: Amy Riccadonna

name: Jeni Boyce
text: Great people.  Great pizza.

name: Christopher Kennis
text: Went to Richmond for the first time, and have only been to a Blaze pizza in FL. This location is AWESOME, I will definitely be back to visit again. Blaze is amazing if you want a really good personal pizza made in front of you how you like, and it cooks fast, it's a must try!!! The staff was great!!!

text: This is a very unusual pizza place.  I really enjoy being able to walk down the line and pick the toppings for my pizza. Unlimited. No additional cost. Fast, easy, and great taste.  And, you can't beat the price.

name: Amanda Tipton
text: The service is great but I don't like the sauce.

name: Scott Newby

text: First time there. I got a "build your own". The menu was a bit confusing, but after talking with the woman taking orders was comfortable enough. Next time will be much easier. I got there at the start of lunch, so our pizza had to wait a ‚Ä¶More

name: Swetha Y
text: Love the pizza here. Very very reasonable prices. They have Keto and cauliflower crusts too. With personalized pizza option you can choose unlimited toppings. Their fried garlic topping is to die for. Recommend this place over the other pizza places.

name: Jo Bu
text: The staff always greets with a smile! And the fresh toppings have made this spot a regular for me! The price and portions are very reasonable.

name: nicole knight
text: Great atmosphere food was really good

name: FromDaCluhouse Music

name: Stephanie White
text: Love this place. Delicious, fresh and hot pizza. Top notch service from the manager, John, and his team.

name: Courtney Henning
text: Crispy, chronic pizza. It's absolutely amazing how crispy the deep dish style crust pizza is. Legitimately my favorite pizza spot in town.

name: shag ostrich
text: Good pizza, friendly employees who care. Even when extremely busy they are on top of things and keep the line moving at a steady pace. Interesting drink choices lots of fruity fresh juice and organic sodas. Gluten free friendly as well. I personally love that they have fresh mozzarella as an option.

name: michael smith
text:
Great idea.
A Chipotle style pizza spot. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sharon Faith Graves
text: I go to Blaze about once a week. The pizza is made to order with high quality ingredients. The pepperoni has such a good flavor and doesn‚Äôt taste processed like at some other pizza chains. The app works well for quick ordering to save time. ‚Ä¶More

text: Good pizza and service, quick turnaround. Great lunch spot

name: Fred Hornberger Jr
text: Service is always great here and the pizza is fantastic.  They even have 3 different GF crusts.  It was very busy, but only took 10 min to get my pizza.

text: You should know what toppings to add else it will be a disappointing experience. Roasted garlic and brussels I would like it stand alone. Ricotta was blah and bland on art lover. text: I loved the pizza and their Agua Fresca was delicious! only dropped them down a star bc the employees weren't very helpful and a bit short with me when I came in for the first time. but the restaurant was clean and had a good fast-paced casual dining atmosphere.

name: Jason Cooper
text: Great food, good prices.  Need a better flow. Myself and everyone I saw who came in didn't know which side of the line to go to.

The pizza is fast and actually pretty good,  better than those from similar concept competition Pie Five, but not in the top ten for Richmond.  Check their app for deals.

name: Sharvell Williams
text: The pizza was decent, it wasnt the best ive had . Also the person calling out when the pizza was ready was a little rude as well.

name: Paul Busse
text: The service was excellent - everyone there was courteous and focused on their job.  I was very disappointed with the quantity of toppings used. The pie five across Broad Street from them has closed, so I guess I'll have to drive to Willow Lawn to get a pizza that meets my expectations.
